body: Hey, I want to do my server to practice.. is there any plugin similar to avicus so I can play with my friends with public maps and then have a scrimmage?
body_tagged: Hey, I want to do my server to practice.. is there any plugin similar to avicus so I can play with my friends with public maps and then have a scrimmage?
title: I want to do my private server

replies.body: There is something called a scrimmage server, and yes there is but I forgot it's name.
replies.body_tagged: There is something called a scrimmage server, and yes there is but I forgot it's name.

replies.body: pretty sure scrim servers still aren't working, devs have been too busy with 1.7 and "executors"
replies.body_tagged: pretty sure scrim servers still aren't working, devs have been too busy with 1.7 and "executors"

reply_to.body: There is something called a scrimmage server, and yes there is but I forgot it's name.

replies.body:
Check this out, its exactly what you're looking for.

I tried this out the other day and it only takes about 30m to setup.

https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/cardinalpgm.5191/

replies.body: It might be, but I'm not sure.
replies.body_tagged: It might be, but I'm not sure.

replies.body: Just download CardinalPGM it can do almost anything or even anythind I don't actually know but it's a great plugin and I believe like the only one to use on scrim servers.
replies.body_tagged: Just download CardinalPGM it can do almost anything or even anythind I don't actually know but it's a great plugin and I believe like the only one to use on scrim servers.

replies.body: I have ocn (cardinalpgm) now, but Avic.us maps from the forum don't work...
replies.body_tagged: I have ocn (cardinalpgm) now, but Avic.us maps from the forum don't work...

replies.body:
Thats because the Overcast map.xml and the Avicus map.xml are not coded the same!

Make sure you configure it correctly, check out the article here - https://docs.avicus.net/en/modules/map/
replies.body_tagged:
Thats because the Overcast map.xml and the Avicus map.xml are not coded the same!

Make sure you configure it correctly, check out the article here - https://docs.avicus.net/en/modules/map/

reply_to.body_tagged: I have ocn (cardinalpgm) now, but Avic.us maps from the forum don't work...

replies.body: And how I transform avicus xml to overcast xml? the map is not mine
replies.body_tagged: And how I transform avicus xml to overcast xml? the map is not mine

replies.body: Use the plugin cardinal! It takes a while to set up if you dont know what you doing but you need to make sure you got sportbukkit in the right version on the server and everything!
replies.body_tagged: Use the plugin cardinal! It takes a while to set up if you dont know what you doing but you need to make sure you got sportbukkit in the right version on the server and everything!

replies.body: I have it! But i want to put avicus maps
